name: Deathmatch
effect: If there are at least 2 enemies nearby, ATK is increased by {0}% and DEF is increased by {1}%. If there are less than 2 enemies nearby, ATK is increased by {2}%.
description: A sharp crimson polearm that was once a gladiator's priceless treasure. Its awl has been stained by the blood of countless beasts and men.
